author: Chris Reed
description: All the biggest sales you need to find the perfect gift for the dad in your life for Father's Day 2025.
title: I Found the Best Father’s Day Sales for Last Minute Deals

author: Myles Obenza
description: The perfect Father's Gift for that MCU and LEGO fan in your life.
title: Amazon Snaps a LEGO Marvel Infinity Gauntlet Deal Into Existence Ahead of Father's Day

author: Erik Adams
description: Echo Valley wants to be a lot of different kinds of movie, and in the process, becomes a poor facsimile of both a family drama and a thriller.
title: Echo Valley Review

author: Noah Hunter
description: Which Xbox generation was the best?
title: Every Xbox Console: A Full History of Release Dates

author: Jacob Kienlen
description: Explore the Call of Duty timeline, from WWII to space battles.
title: How to Play the Call of Duty Games in Order

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: We spoke to Splitgate 2 director Ian Proulx following a trifecta of controversies upon the launch of his game in an effort to try and understand what was going on with him and 1047 Games.
title: Splitgate 2 Director Refuses to Apologize for ‘Make FPS Great Again Hat’, Then Apologizes Anyway

author: Adam Bankhurst
description: The Incredibles 3 will reportedly be directed by Elemental and The Good Dinosaur's Peter Sohn instead of Brad Bird, who wrote and directed the first two films in the franchise.
title: Incredibles 3 Will Reportedly Be Directed by Elemental's Peter Sohn Instead of Brad Bird

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: The DCU doesn't yet have a Justice League. Instead, it's got a Justice Gang. Here are the biggest takeaways from a revealing new interview with the cast of James Gunn's Superman.
title: The DCU Justice League Doesn't Exist (Yet) and Other Major Details We Learned About James Gunn's Superman

author: Eric Song
description: Equipped with your choice of RTX 5070 Ti, RTX 5080, or RTX 5090 GPU.
title: Save Up to $300 Off Alienware's Top-of-the-Line Area-51 Gaming Laptops with New Nvidia GPUs

author: Eric Song
description: Your last chance to save 25% off the iridescent Chroma series controllers.
title: PS5 Dualsense Controller Deals Are Ending Tomorrow as Part of the PlayStation Days of Play Sale

author: Jacob Kienlen
description: Get the one gift to rule them all.
title: A Ton of Lord of the Rings Books and Movies Are Buy One, Get One Half Off at Amazon

author: Lex Briscuso
description: The upcoming Big Bang Theory spinoff series Stuart Fails to Save the Universe is going to hit with, well, a bang apparently — because according to creator Chuck Lorre, the show is set to have some serious visual effects.
title: Apparently The Upcoming Big Bang Theory Spinoff Stuart Fails to Save the Universe Will Have 'A Lot of CGI'

author: Eric Song
description: This power bank even include a built-in USB cable so you don't need to bring your own.
title: This $11 Iniu 10,000mAh 45W Power Bank Will Charge the Nintendo Switch 2 at Its Fastest Rate

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: James Gunn has confirmed a new Wonder Woman movie is officially in development, saying it’s “being written right now.”
title: Wonder Woman Movie Officially in Development, James Gunn Says It’s ‘Being Written Right Now’

author: Tom Phillips
description: Mario Kart World players are sharing coin farming tricks to unlock all vehicles — and one can even be done AFK.
title: Mario Kart World Fans Sharing Coin Farming Tricks to Unlock All Vehicles Fast — and One Can Even Be Done AFK

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: Check out an exclusive preview of The Marvel Art of Tyler Kirkham, featuring some gorgeous cover images from books like The Amazing Spider-Man and Venom.
title: The Marvel Art of Tyler Kirkham Celebrates a Master Spider-Man Artist

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: EVE Frontier is, if nothing else, an intriguing experiment in the making. It could be an absolute trash fire, and I remain actively wary of its blockchain and cryptocurrency elements. But I did have fun playing the small bit of it we got access to, and it is an enticing invitation to settle and develop fresh empires in a blank slate galaxy with no major NPC factions to work around.
title: EVE Frontier Wants to Fully Hand the Galaxy Over to the Players

author: Eric Song
description: Time is running out to put in your order and get it delivered by June 15.
title: Save 33% Off the Apple AirPods Pro Noise Cancelling Earbuds and Have It Arrive by Father's Day

author: Meg Koepp
description: Our Dune: Awakening map includes locations for quests, Intel, Trading Posts, and more!
title: Dune: Awakening Interactive Map is Now Available

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: In the upcoming Obsidian game Grounded 2, one of the premier features that’s new in the sequel is the ability to mount a bug like a horsey and ride it around. And that feature is also one of the main reasons that Obsidian is making Grounded 2 in the first place. Grounded 1 simply wasn't big enough for bug-back riding.
title: Grounded 2 Exists Because Obsidian Was ‘Running Out of Room’ in Grounded 1

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: I got a chance to play a little bit of what players will be shrinking into next month at the Xbox Games Showcase in Los Angeles over the weekend. And my overall impression, which I say as a full-throated compliment, is that yup, that's a little bit bigger Grounded all right!
title: Grounded 2 First Hands-on Preview: Bigger Than Before

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Several members of Invincible VS's 40+ person development team played a core role in the development of 2013’s Killer Instinct, and you can feel that influence. Seeing Invincible VS is one thing, but when I sat down to play it and speak with members of the team, I knew I was among fellow sickos – and I mean that in the most complimentary way.
title: Invincible VS Is a Brutal, Bloody 3v3 Tag Fighter

author: Ryan McCaffrey
title: Ninja Gaiden 4 First Hands-On Impressions: It’s Faster and Bloodier Than Ever

author: Tom Phillips
description: Switch 2 was Nintendo's biggest UK console launch in history, early sales data has revealed, beating the company's previous record holder, Nintendo 3DS.
title: Switch 2 the Fastest-Selling Nintendo Console in UK History, but PS5 and Xbox Series X/S Launches Were Bigger

author: Vikki Blake
description: Dune: Awakening won't release on console until some point in 2026, developer Funcom has said.
title: Dune: Awakening Won't Release on Console Until Some Point in 2026

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Nintendo has announced Splatoon Raiders, a brand-new Splatoon spin-off exclusive to the Switch 2. The surprise reveal was made with a trailer that was released first on the Nintendo Today! app.
title: Nintendo Just Announced Splatoon Raiders as a Switch 2 Exclusive, With a Major Update Coming to Splatoon 3

author: Scott Collura
description: Predator: Killer of Killers, the new animated movie on Hulu, is a reminder of what makes the series work.
title: Predator: Killer of Killers Proves What the Franchise Should Have Been Doing All Along

author: Tom Phillips
description: Last night, MindsEye developer Build A Rocket Boy warned players on Xbox that the game's launch day update would miss its release due to "varied platform certification". This warning has now been scrubbed from the developer's release day reddit post, and Build A Rocket Boy has told IGN that Xbox players will now be able to download MindsEye's day one update after all.
title: [UPDATE] MindsEye Day One Update With 'Key Refinements' Now Set to Make Launch Day on Xbox After Developer Previously Said it Wouldn't

author: Tom Phillips
description: Marvel has dropped a new trailer for upcoming Disney+ show Ironheart that reveals a magic-powered Iron Man-style suit for heroine Riri Williams.
title: Ironheart Trailer Reveals Magic-Infused Iron Man Suit, Sparking Fresh Speculation Marvel Will Finally Introduce Mephisto

author: Ben Williams
description: My Nintendo Store UK has restocked the Pokemon Scarlet & Violet Dual Pack, including three steelbooks, for £99.99.
title: Pokémon Scarlet and Violet Steelbook Dual Pack is Back In Stock and Available Again at Nintendo for RRP £99.99

author: Robert Anderson
description: Project Hail Mary, Inferno, The Martian Chronicles, and more are down to just $2 on Kindle at Amazon today.
title: These Popular eBooks Are Down to Just $2 at Amazon Today

author: Vikki Blake
description: Lies of P developer Neowiz did indeed drop DLC Overture during Summer Game Fest, introducing new locations, new enemies and bosses, new characters, weapons, and the very controversial decision to add in two easier difficulty options. And now, those options are getting easier again as the team preps for "difficulty reduction."
title: Lies of P DLC Overture Director Vows to 'Review Various Adjustments, Including Difficulty Reduction'

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: John Wick 5 is official and Keanu Reeves has signed on to “give John’s story the proper next step.” We know that much. But, how can that be, given the ending of John Wick 4? It turns out that's something of a head-scratcher even for director Chad Stahelski.
title: The Director of John Wick Is Still Trying to Work Out How to Make Keanu Reeves in John Wick 5 Make Sense Given the Ending of 4

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Screenwriter and producer Jeremy Slater has talked up Mortal Kombat 2, describing it as “so much funnier and bigger” than the first movie. He also said fans reacted to test screenings "the way I reacted to Avengers: Endgame."
title: Mortal Kombat 2 Movie Writer Says Fans Reacted to Test Screenings ‘The Way I Reacted to Avengers: Endgame’

author: Tom Phillips
description: A battery indicator issue reported by some Switch 2 owners has been acknowleged by Nintendo — and there's now a set of steps to follow for a (hopefully) quick fix.
title: Nintendo Acknowledges Switch 2 Battery Indicator Issue and Offers Fix

author: Vikki Blake
description: While sandworm-riding is usually the first thing we want to try, and then fail at, in Dune: Awakening, it turns out that if you're super patient and don't mind a little screen-tearing or clipping through assets, it can be done.
title: Yes, You Can Ride Sandworms In Dune: Awakening — Kinda

author: Tom Phillips
description: Mario Kart World fans have discovered a way to zoom around the game's open world in Mirror Mode — and the way to access it is a cool throwback to a classic Nintendo platformer.
title: Mario Kart World Hides Mirror Mode Free Roam Behind a Mario 64 Easter Egg

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: In the wake of Call of Duty: Black Ops 7’s announcement (the one designed to feel like a Beyonce album drop), both Activision and Nintendo are said to be working on getting the long-running first-person shooter franchise on Switch. But does that mean Black Ops 7 will be on Switch 2? Activision has released a statement in response.
title: Activision Says It’s Working With Nintendo to Get Call of Duty on Switch, but Will Black Ops 7 Be on Switch 2?

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Elden Ring Nightreign developer FromSoftware has released update 1.01.2, which focuses on bug fixes for Nightlords, weapons, Guardian's Remembrance and more. Check out the patch notes.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign Patch 1.01.2 Makes a Number of Bug Fixes for Nightlords, Weapons, Guardian's Remembrance and More

author: Vikki Blake
description: The Screen Actors Guild - American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (SAG-AFTRA) has reached a "tentative agreement" on the interactive media contract, potentially bringing to an end almost a year of industrial action across the video game industry.
title: SAG-AFTRA Reaches 'Tentative Agreement' With Video Game Companies Over AI Protections for Performers

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: The co-CEO of the developer of upcoming game MindsEye claimed two weeks ago that there is a “concerted effort” to “trash the game and the studio,” and suggested people were being paid to say negative things about the game online. But when asked, the CEO of Hitman developer IO Interactive, which is publishing the game, said that he doesn't believe that's happening.
title: Hitman Boss Says He 'Doesn't Believe' People Are Being Paid to Post Negative Comments About MindsEye

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: IGN interviews the developer of God Save Birmingham to find out if it's a fresh take on the zombie survival genre, or a "scam game" like The Day Before.
title: Why the Developers Behind God Save Birmingham Are Perfectly Happy With Comparisons to 'Scam' Game The Day Before

author: Tom Phillips
description: Our first look at Resident Evil Requiem might have centered on a new character, Grace Ashcroft, but that hasn't stopped speculation the survival horror secretly also stars a more familiar face: Leon S. Kennedy.
title: Resident Evil Requiem Secretly Stars Leon, Fans Believe, As Trailer Easter Eggs and Actor's Resume Potentially Point to His Return

author: Adam Mathew
description: We've only got a short week to refresh your library with some absolute corkers dropping to their lowest prices in yonks.
title: AU Deals: Sweet Deals on Mario Kart World, Bravely Defaults, Red Deads, Dragon's Dogma 2, and More!

author: Eric Song
description: An essential part of dad's car emergency kit.
title: Save 57% Off the Lokithor J400 Cordless Car Jump Starter for Father's Day
